named-query.name: User.findByEmailAndPassword
named-query.query: select usr from User usr where usr.email= ? and usr.password= ?

named-query.name: User.getTokenByEmail
named-query.query: select user.token from User user where user.email=:email

named-query.name: User.getUserByNickName
named-query.query: select user from User user where user.nickName=:nickName

named-query.name: User.getUserByEmail

named-query.name: User.getUserByNickLike
named-query.query: select user.nickName from User user where user.nickName like :userNickName
